sentences.en: The money will be used for the upkeep of the park.
sentences.cn: 这些钱将用于该公园的维护。

sentences.en: Tenants are responsible for the upkeep of rented property.
sentences.cn: 承租人应负责维修租用的房产。

sentences.en: He makes payments to his ex-wife for the upkeep of their children.
sentences.cn: 他向前妻支付子女的抚养费。
